com.sap.furcas.ide.projectwizard.wizards
Class LanguagePage

java.lang.Object
  WizardPage
      com.sap.furcas.ide.projectwizard.wizards.LanguagePage

public class LanguagePage
extends WizardPage

This is the first page of the wizard used to collect the information needed for the creation of a new Furcas DSL project. That is:

The projectname, the language name and its file extension.

The projectwizard uses ProjectInfo to save all the user input.

Method Detail

getProjectInfo

public ProjectInfo getProjectInfo()
Returns:
The user input

createControl

public void createControl(Composite parent)
Creates the UI of the wizard being the 3 labels and 3 textfields. Also adds listeners that call the method dialogChanged() everytime the content of any textfield changes.

initialize

private void initialize()
Initializes all three textfields

dialogChanged

void dialogChanged()
This method is called when the content of one of the textfields changes. It sets the fitting variables in the ProjectInfo instance and checks the user input for errors. If the user has entered appropriate input the finish button will be enabled.
